title: I want to return this product and get back the refund. I bought it from Flipkart. Battery issue
content:
Battery is draining out very fast. 
The screen on time is 4.5 to maximum 5 hrs.
I have bought it from Flipkart. I want to return this product and want refund.
I talked with their survice and they told to contact with you.
I am not using any heavy apps or games or camera. I am using only normal phone call, whatsapp. Still it is giving this much battery backup.
